animation

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • animation.Animation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Animation

    The model of the animation. It contains all variables needed to create and configure the animation. It calculates the values for animating angular motion form varying speed, scale and user-inputted values.

    Since:
    27/12/2015 Created: 7/12/2015
    Author:
    BRYAN KRISTIONO
